mem[0] = 32'b00000000001000001000001001100011; // beq x1, x2, 4
mem[1] = 32'b00000000001000001001001001100011; // bne x1, x2, 4
mem[2] = 32'b00000000001000001100001001100011; // blt x1, x2, 4
mem[3] = 32'b00000000001000001101001001100011; // bge x1, x2, 4
mem[4] = 32'b00000000001000001110001001100011; // bltu x1, x2, 4
mem[5] = 32'b00000000001000001111001001100011; // bgeu x1, x2, 4
